amendment.description: Amendment sought to reallocate $2.5 million to the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds in the House Historic Buildings Revitalization Trust Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 113-426 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds in the House Historic Buildings Revitalization Trust Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 248 (Roll no. 191).
